label: CooperatingOrganization
comment: An organized structure set up for a particular purpose, such as a business, government body, department, charity, or financial institution that is working together with another organization, business, or person.

datatypeProperties.comment: A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The code specifying the role for this cooperating organization.

objectProperties.comment: A specified cooperative information source used for or from this cooperating organization.
